sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spain reports another death from monkeypox, bringing the total of fatalities from the virus so far in Europe to two.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia and Ukraine blame each other for killing Ukrainian POWs as ships wait to carry grain from Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Iraqi protesters have once again stormed Parliament in support of powerful cleric Muqtada al-Saad to stop the nomination of a new Prime Minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: On the road and by train, it's the busiest day of the holidays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There have now been two confirmed deaths from monkeypox in Spain and so far they are thought

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: to be the only fatalities from the virus in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, there are more than 21,000 cases worldwide, with many being on the African continent where the virus is now endemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Europe, Spain has reported more than 4,000 cases and is administering 5,300 vaccines received from the joint EU vaccine purchase scheme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But health workers say they are not enough to cover the at-risk groups.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The illness can be relatively mild for many, but people can be contagious for weeks and the lesions can be extremely painful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Haran Tulane had to be hospitalized. He describes how the virus took hold. The lesions started on my nose only. I didn't have any lesions until I got into the hospital and started to take some antibiotics and paracetamols.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I think that was like a couple of days after that the lesions appeared on my hands and on my feet and on my legs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The WHO last week declared the monkeypox outbreak a global health emergency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Its director general said doing so would help speed up the development of vaccines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Both sides in the conflict are blaming each other for the attack on Olenivka prison camp,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: where 53 Ukrainian POWs died. Russia claims it was a Ukrainian HIMARS strike on Donetsk, but Ukraine strongly denies this and says Moscow-backed forces shelled the prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I've received reports today about the attack of the occupiers on Olenivka Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It was a deliberate Russian war crime, a deliberate mass murder of Ukrainian prisoners of war, more than 50 dead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: When the defenders of Azovstal left the plant, the UN and the International Committee of the Red Cross acted as guarantors of the life and health of our soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And the war goes on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In the heavily bombed southern Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv, Russian attacks killed five people and wounded seven more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: While smoke rose in the skies above the eastern Ukrainian city of Soledar, now seen as the latest target in Russia's offensive push in the Donbass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: As the heavy fighting continues, ships wait to carry Ukrainian grain from the port of Odessa under the terms brokered between Ukraine and Russia in Turkey, in an attempt to guarantee global food security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Iraqi protesters once again breaching parliament

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: in a show of support for powerful Iraqi cleric Muqtada al-Assad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This just days after storming the legislative body to suspend a session to nominate a new prime minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: al-Saad's bloc emerged from elections in October as the biggest parliamentary faction, but was still far short of a majority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ten months on, deadlock persists and a new government has not been formed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Supporters of the populist Shiite cleric oppose the recently announced candidacy of Mohamed al-Sadani, a former prime minister and ex-provincial governor who is the pro-Iran coordination framework's pick for premier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The protests are the latest challenge for oil-rich Iraq, deep in a political and socio-economic crisis despite increased global crude prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Over 400 people have been able to disembark after being rescued in the Mediterranean Sea

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: in four separate operations last week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A German humanitarian organization's maritime rescue ship, Sea Watch 3, arrived in the port of Taranto in southern Italy in the early hours of Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Among those able to dock were 117 unaccompanied minors and 34 women, four of them pregnant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to officials, the people are currently going through registration and medical care before reaching the first reception structures. Italy's Interior Ministry says from January to July, 34,000 people arrived in Italy by sea, almost 10,000 more than over the same period last year. This wave of migration is expected to be a key topic in Italy's snap election in September.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Recent polls suggest that a bloc of conservative parties led by the far-right brothers of Italy could win a majority, and the latter supports calls for zero tolerance to illegal migration and renegotiating EU treaties on the matter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Germany's foreign minister has urged Turkey to respect human rights during a testy first visit. After a seemingly gracious meeting, the ministers argued over several issues in a tense and drawn-out news conference, trading barbs over disputes with Ankara and Athens, jailed Turkish philanthropist Osman Kavala and Kurdish militants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: When there are so many verdicts waiting to be implemented and you've just arrived from Greece without ever having recalled any of these verdicts there, why are you still raising the issue of Osman Kavala?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Because you are using him against Turkey, you are financing him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Germany has always defended Osman Kavala, jailed for life this year on what most Western governments believe are trumped-up charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Baerbock says, it's my duty as foreign minister to respect and defend the judgments of the European Court of Human Rights without exception and at all times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: She warns that Turkey's threat to launch a new offensive against Kurdish military in northern Syria will only cause more people pain. It's her first visit to Turkey as foreign minister, but the Turks appear to miss the Merkel government, with Chololo saying Germany's position used to be more balanced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Bumper to bumper, the traffic on the Payage outside Paris was almost all in one

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: direction. By tradition, it's the busiest day of the year on French roads when those who take their summer holidays in July meet the people who vacation in August. By mid-morning, there were 800 kilometers of traffic jams across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They were queuing all along the Rh√¥ne River in Valence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And the line of traffic on the north-south route at Gotthard in Switzerland stretched for 20 kilometres, as seen repeated elsewhere on Swiss motorways, where families heading off on holiday found any way they could to cool their heels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: For rail travellers, it was crowded platforms, here at the Gare de Lyon in Paris, as 400,000 French holidaymakers travelled by train.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Braving the heat and the weight to secure a place in the sun.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: While in Belgium, a high-speed train hit an animal on the tracks, an accident that left some passengers stranded on the train while also having a knock-on effect on other parts of the rail network.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Wildfires are raging across Europe, but they're also threatening the huge forests in the Caucasus mountains in Georgia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They're an important natural lung, absorbing carbon dioxide and breathing out oxygen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That's why preventing fires there is very important, and the country's environment ministry is concerned about increasing temperatures. In Georgia we usually have many forest fires over the summer, but fortunately we've not had a massive loss of forested areas until now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But that doesn't mean we can relax.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: What with climate change, it's expected that the number of forest fires in the country will increase.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That's why it's important to take preventative measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Absorbing greenhouse gases is not the only role forests play in slowing the pace of climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They also regulate water flows and are home to many species of plants, animals and insects, to name but a few.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: So careful forest management is an important issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We see manifestations of climate change every year and this year was no exception.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We had a storm on the Black Sea in January and there was an uneven distribution of rain in the spring.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Unfortunately this trend will continue since it's too early to talk about reducing the concentration of gases that cause climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In Georgia, forest and field fires are mostly caused by humans. So particularly when temperatures are high, the authorities are urging people not to leave easily flammable waste in nature and not to light fires near trees.
